responseTypes.description: The base API URL for the F1 Connect service.
The URL used to fetch the drivers data with query parameters for limit and offset.
The number of results returned per request.
The offset used for pagination, i.e., the starting point for the result set.
The total number of drivers available in the dataset.
A list of driver objects returned from the API.
A unique identifier for the driver.
The driver's first name.
The driver's surname.
The driver's nationality.
The driver's birthdate in DD/MM/YYYY format.
The driver's racing number.
The driver's abbreviated name, often used in standings or graphics.
A URL to the Wikipedia page of the driver.
